医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的蛋白质组学见解：脑脊液生物标志物在检测路易体痴呆方面显示出希望研究人员进行了脑脊液 (CSF) 蛋白质组分析并鉴定了 CSF 蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/New-proteomic-insights-cerebrospinal-fluid-biomarkers-show-promise-in-detecting-dementia-with-Lewy-bodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/New-proteomic-insights-cerebrospinal-fluid-biomarkers-show-promise-in-detecting-dementia-with-Lewy-bodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67e5fbc5-ebad-4533-b74c-bcc8578fcdf0 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 04:05:00 -0400 New proteomic insights: cerebrospinal fluid biomarkers show promise in detecting dementia with Lewy bodies
增强免疫力：Delta 和 Omicron-BA.1 感染可增强对接种疫苗患者的保护研究人员检查了突破性感染的住院患者的免疫反应和潜在的交叉保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Boosted-immunity-Delta-and-Omicron-BA1-infections-enhance-protection-in-vaccinated-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Boosted-immunity-Delta-and-Omicron-BA1-infections-enhance-protection-in-vaccinated-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3ad50f1-60ee-4e86-9852-29eabd2ba181 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 03:41:00 -0400 Boosted immunity: Delta and Omicron-BA.1 infections enhance protection in vaccinated patients
为制药公司和医疗保健开发创新的混合现实培训平台英国沉浸式技术公司 FourPlus 与合作者 Holosphere 和 Cell and Gene Therapy Catapult 获得了 Innovate UK 的资助，用于创建和测试混合现实培训平台，为制药公司和医疗保健提供定制培训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Innovative-mixed-reality-training-platform-to-be-development-for-pharmaceutical-companies-and-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Innovative-mixed-reality-training-platform-to-be-development-for-pharmaceutical-companies-and-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da96b0fd-7216-41fc-9279-1b0174ba6bfb Mon, 17 Jul 2023 01:31:00 -0400 Innovative mixed reality training platform to be developed for pharmaceutical companies and healthcare
健康的乳房脂肪可以预防侵袭性乳腺癌研究人员找到了一个可能的解释，解释为什么较高的乳腺密度和较高的年龄会增加患乳腺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Healthy-breast-fat-may-protect-against-侵袭-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Healthy-breast-fat-may-protect-against-侵袭-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6883d866-e439-4ccc-90b5-b1ec68d2c49a Mon, 17 Jul 2023 01:29:00 -0400 Healthy breast fat may protect against invasive breast cancer
稳定的纳米粒子训练免疫系统对抗癌症在过去的十年中，研究人员一直在寻找更有效、更持久的癌症治疗方法。在各种各样的免疫疗法中，干扰素基因激活刺激剂（STING 激动）已成为一种特别有前途的方法，它利用患者的免疫系统来对抗全身的肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Stable-nanoarticles-train-the-immune-system-to-fight-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Stable-nanoarticles-train-the-immune-system-to-fight-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfd765e7-6e96-4e09-a64a-4dfb6a081f9e Mon, 17 Jul 2023 01:25:00 -0400 Stable nanoparticles train the immune system to fight cancer
研究显示，社区环境会增加 COVID-19 住院风险COVID-19 症状的范围各不相同，有些人感觉轻微感冒，有些人住院，有些人死亡。许多研究将 COVID-19 症状的严重程度与个人的生物因素联系起来，但人们对非生物因素（例如人们居住的环境）的影响知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Neighborhood-environment-can-increase-risk-of-COVID-19-hospitalization-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Neighborhood-environment-can-increase-risk-of-COVID-19-hospitalization-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75d762b4-36d6-4b28-a5c9-e8f74887f571 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 22:50:00 -0400 Neighborhood environment can increase risk of COVID-19 hospitalization, study reveals
研究发现，剧烈运动可减缓帕金森病的病程来自罗马天主教大学医学院和 A. Gemelli IRCCS 综合诊所基金会的神经科学家发现，剧烈运动可以减缓帕金森病的病程，并描述了其生物学机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Intective-exercise-slows-the-course-of-Parkinsons-disease-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Intective-exercise-slows-the-course-of-Parkinsons-disease-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=429447c4-18b8-4db2-8a6c-95b747879441 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 22:41:00 -0400 Intensive exercise slows the course of Parkinson's disease, study finds
研究描述了夏威夷大学医疗中心音乐治疗项目的范围和整合大学医院 (UH) Connor Whole Health 的一项新研究描述了他们在 10 个 UH 医疗中心内音乐治疗项目的范围和整合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-describes-the-scope-and-integration-of-music-therapy-program-within-UH-medical-centers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-describes-the-scope-and-integration-of-music-therapy-program-within-UH-medical-centers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f0ed05d-47b2-45ba-927d-814842fc86e0 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 22:38:00 -0400 Study describes the scope and integration of music therapy program within UH medical centers
真菌感染：慢性鼻窦炎的罕见但重要原因2023 年 5 月 27 日，《Oncoscience》（第 10 卷）发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“跳出框框思考——慢性鼻窦炎的非典型感染”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Fungal-infections-A-rare-but-important-cause-of-chronic-sinusitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Fungal-infections-A-rare-but-important-cause-of-chronic-sinusitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a4117d1-8d41-45c7-a054-e7df57789fcc Fri, 14 Jul 2023 21:57:00 -0400 Fungal infections: A rare but important cause of chronic sinusitis
研究发现有氧糖酵解对哺乳动物眼睛发育至关重要根据发表在《自然通讯》上的西北医学新研究，有氧糖酵解是细胞将葡萄糖转化为乳酸的过程，是哺乳动物眼睛发育的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Aerobic-grinding-essential-for-eye-development-in-mammals-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Aerobic-grinding-essential-for-eye-development-in-mammals-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef395ef9-a58b-4b2a-8237-3cc06eb468c7 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 21:09:00 -0400 Aerobic glycolysis essential for eye development in mammals, study finds
